Phantom.Strength: If within 10 meters of a manifested Yurei your sanity will drop by 0.4% per second instead of the normal sanity drain of 0.2% per second.
Phantom.Weakness: Taking a photo of the Phantom will make it disappear. Will not stop hunts or ghost events.
Phantom.Ability: Can walk to a random players location and leave an emf-3 at the starting location. During a hunt it will blink visible every 1 - 2 seconds instead of the default 0.3 - 1 seconds.

Poltergeist.Strength: Poltergesit can throw multiple objects at once.
Poltergeist.Weakness: Cannot throw multiple objects if there aren't any objects.
Poltergeist.Ability: If it uses it's multi-throw ability, every nearby player will loose two sanity for each item that was thrown.

Raiju.Strength: It will travel at 2.5 m/s for some time if it steps on any electrical equipment, barring headmounted camera, motion and sound sensors.
Raiju.Weakness: It disrupts electrical equipment at a greater than normal radius that increases with the map size, making it easier to track.
Raiju.Ability: While nearby electrical equipment it's hunting threshold increases to 65% sanity.

Revenant.Strength: A Revenant will travel at double the default ghost movement speed if it has light of sight with a player.
Revenant.Weakness: Will travel at 0.5 the default ghost movement speed if it doesn't have line of sight with a player

Shade.Strength: Hard to find because they are less active.
Shade.Weakness: Cannot hunt if there's multiple people nearby.

Spirit.Weakness: Smudging it will prevent it from hunting for 180 seconds instead of the default 90 seconds.

The Twins.Strength: Can initiate an attack from either of The Twins.
The Twins.Weakness: Often interacts with the enviroment at the same time.
The Twins.Ability: One of The Twins is faster that the other.

Wraith.Strength: Doesn't set footprints when stepping in salt.

Yokai.Strength: Has a hunt threshold of 80% sanity while players are talking near it.
Yokai.Weakness: During a hunt it can only hear players and sense equipment within 2 meters.

Yurei.Strength: If within 10 meters of a manifested Yurei your sanity will drop by 0.4% per second instead of the normal sanity drain of 0.2% per second.
Yurei.Weakness: When smudged, the Yurei can't leave it's ghost room for the duration of the smudge (90 seconds).
Yurei.Ability: Drops the sanity of all players by an unkown amount regardless of their position.
